title: RP Drawing

replies.body: This is really cute and such an awesome drawing!  I don't know if it's intentional, but there's something about it that reminds me of FFX Lulu that I'm adoring.  Some poros may have added RP on your account.  Thanks for the drawing. :D

Instead of posting the gallery, you could post the direct link!
https://i.imgur.com/cpOIreT.jpg
It will also show up as an icon on the thread list. I love this drawing!! And I'm sure the poro's will happily reward you with the RP you need!
Thank you so much! I tried posting the direct link but it doesn't seemed to be showing up.
